Smart-contract to manage Options pool, collatral pool, mine pool, FPTCoin, etc.  ","methods":{"addCollateral(uint256)":{"details":"Deposit collateral in this pool from user.","params":{"amount":"the amount of collateral to deposit."}},"addWhiteList(address)":{"details":"Implementation of add an eligible address into the whitelist.","params":{"addAddress":"new eligible address."}},"buyOption(uint256,uint256,uint32,uint256,uint256,uint8)":{"details":"user buy option and create new option.","params":{"amount":"user input amount of new option user want to buy.","expiration":"user input expiration,time limit from now","optType":"user input option type","settlementAmount":"amount of settlement user want fo pay.","strikePrice":"user input option's strike price","underlying":"user input option's underlying id, 1 for BTC,2 for ETH"}},"calOptionsOccupied(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint8)":{"details":"The auxiliary function for calculate option occupied. ","params":{"amount":"option's amount","optType":"option's type, 0 for call, 1 for put.","strikePrice":"option's strike price","underlyingPrice":"option's underlying price"}},"constructor":{"details":"Options manager constructor. set other contract address","params":{"FPTCoinAddr":"FPTCoin contract address","optionsPoolAddr":"optoins pool contract address","optionsPriceAddr":"options price contract address","oracleAddr":"fnx oracle contract address."}},"exerciseOption(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"User exercise option.","params":{"amount":"user input amount of option user want to exercise.","optionsId":"option's ID which was wanted to exercise, must owned by user"}},"getAvailableCollateral()":{"details":"Retrieve the available collateral worth, the worth of collateral which can used for buy options, priced in USD. "},"getInputAmountRange()":{"details":"get the valid range of input amount"},"getLeftCollateral()":{"details":"Retrieve the left collateral worth, the worth of collateral which can used for redeem collateral, priced in USD. "},"getOccupiedCollateral()":{"details":"Retrieve the occupied collateral worth, multiplied by minimum collateral rate, priced in USD. "},"getPriceRateRange()":{"details":"retrieve input price valid range rate, thousandths."},"getRealBalance()":{"details":"Retrieve the balance of collateral, the auxiliary function for the total collateral calculation. "},"getTokenNetworth()":{"details":"Retrieve FPTCoin's net worth, priced in USD."},"getTotalCollateral()":{"details":"Retrieve the total collateral worth, priced in USD. "},"getUnlockedCollateral()":{"details":"Retrieve the unlocked collateral worth, the worth of collateral which currently used for options, priced in USD. "},"getUserTotalWorth(address)":{"details":"Retrieve user's current total worth, priced in USD.","params":{"account":"input retrieve account"}},"getWhiteList()":{"details":"Implementation of getting the eligible whitelist."},"isEligibleAddress(address)":{"details":"Implementation of testing whether the input address is eligible.","params":{"tmpAddress":"input address for testing."}},"isInputAmountInRange(uint256)":{"details":"Determine whether the input amount is within the valid range","params":{"Amount":"Test value which is user input"}},"isOwner()":{"details":"Returns true if the caller is the current owner."},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"redeemCollateral(uint256,address)":{"details":"redeem collateral from this pool, user can input the prioritized collateral,he will get this coin, if this coin is unsufficient, he will get others collateral which in whitelist.","params":{"tokenAmount":"the amount of FPTCoin want to redeem."}},"removeWhiteList(address)":{"details":"Implementation of revoke an invalid address from the whitelist.","params":{"removeAddress":"revoked address."}},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.      * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"sellOption(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"User sell option.","params":{"amount":"user input amount of option user want to sell.","optionsId":"option's ID which was wanted to sell, must owned by user"}},"setInputAmountRange(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"set the valid range of input amount","params":{"_maxAmount":"the maximum input amount limit","_minAmount":"the minimum input amount limit"}},"setPriceRateRange(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"set input price valid range rate, thousandths."},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."}},"title":"Options manager contract for finnexus proposal v2."},"userdoc":{"methods":{"approve(address,uint256)":{"notice":"     * Requirements:      * - `spender` cannot be the zero address."},"setHalt(bool)":{"notice":"function Emergency situation that requires contribution period to stop or devdoc.details: A Smart-contract to manage Options pool, collatral pool, mine pool, FPTCoin, etc.

addCollateral(uint256).details: Deposit collateral in this pool from user.

params.amount: the amount of collateral to deposit.

addWhiteList(address).details: Implementation of add an eligible address into the whitelist.

buyOption(uint256,uint256,uint32,uint256.details: user buy option and create new option.

params.amount: user input amount of new option user want to buy.
params.expiration: user input expiration,time limit from now
params.settlementAmount: amount of settlement user want fo pay.
params.underlying: user input option's underlying id, 1 for BTC,2 for ETH

calOptionsOccupied(uint256,uint256,uint2.details: The auxiliary function for calculate option occupied.

params.optType: option's type, 0 for call, 1 for put.

constructor.details: Options manager constructor. set other contract address

params.amount: user input amount of option user want to exercise.
params.optionsId: option's ID which was wanted to exercise, must owned by user

getAvailableCollateral().details: Retrieve the available collateral worth, the worth of collateral which can used for buy options, priced in USD.

getInputAmountRange().details: get the valid range of input amount

getLeftCollateral().details: Retrieve the left collateral worth, the worth of collateral which can used for redeem collateral, priced in USD.

getOccupiedCollateral().details: Retrieve the occupied collateral worth, multiplied by minimum collateral rate, priced in USD.

getPriceRateRange().details: retrieve input price valid range rate, thousandths.

getRealBalance().details: Retrieve the balance of collateral, the auxiliary function for the total collateral calculation.

getTokenNetworth().details: Retrieve FPTCoin's net worth, priced in USD.

getTotalCollateral().details: Retrieve the total collateral worth, priced in USD.

getUnlockedCollateral().details: Retrieve the unlocked collateral worth, the worth of collateral which currently used for options, priced in USD.

getUserTotalWorth(address).details: Retrieve user's current total worth, priced in USD.

getWhiteList().details: Implementation of getting the eligible whitelist.

isEligibleAddress(address).details: Implementation of testing whether the input address is eligible.

isInputAmountInRange(uint256).details: Determine whether the input amount is within the valid range

params.Amount: Test value which is user input

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

redeemCollateral(uint256,address).details: redeem collateral from this pool, user can input the prioritized collateral,he will get this coin, if this coin is unsufficient, he will get others collateral which in whitelist.

params.tokenAmount: the amount of FPTCoin want to redeem.

removeWhiteList(address).details: Implementation of revoke an invalid address from the whitelist.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.      * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.amount: user input amount of option user want to sell.
params.optionsId: option's ID which was wanted to sell, must owned by user

setInputAmountRange(uint256,uint256).details: set the valid range of input amount

setPriceRateRange(uint256,uint256).details: set input price valid range rate, thousandths.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Options manager contract for finnexus proposal v2.

approve(address,uint256).notice: * Requirements:      * - `spender` cannot be the zero address.

setHalt(bool).notice: function Emergency situation that requires contribution period to stop or not.
